homepage.contentSupportTeacher1: Support teachers to give bonus points
homepage.contentHelpTeacher: OlymClass is a user-friendly website that simplifies classroom management and grading. Teachers can easily create clear evaluation criteria, recognize student achievements, and establish fair reward systems. With OlymClass, educators can track student progress and foster a positive learning environment. The app's vibrant design makes learning fun and engaging for students.
homepage.descriptionBonusPoint: Teachers set their own criteria, such as active participation, completing assignments, and helping classmates, which correspond to different point values.
homepage.descriptionPenaltyPoint: Students who break the rules will lose points for offenses like: arriving late to class, talking during class, and not keeping the classroom clean...
homepage.joyfulDay: Every day at school is a joyful day!
homepage.des1OlymClas: OlymClass is an app designed to help teachers manage and grade students easily, fairly, and effectively:
homepage.desForTeacher1: Build a clear and fair evaluation system based on specific criteria.
homepage.desForTeacher2: Track and update student scores quickly.
homepage.desForTeacher3: Encourage students to be diligent and actively participate in learning.
homepage.desForEnglishClass1: Replace traditional stickers, earn points to redeem attractive rewards.
homepage.desForExtracurricularClass1: Suitable for using reward points for extracurricular activities such as playing music, singing, drawing...
homepage.desForChildrenGroup1: A vibrant, intuitive interface that makes learning fun for children.
homepage.desForChildrenGroup2: Create a fun, positive learning environment.
homepage.desKeyFeatures: OlymClass empowers teachers to create vibrant, engaging classrooms while simplifying class competition tracking.
homepage.desKeyFeature11: Call out a student's name randomly.
homepage.desKeyFeature21: Set clear guidelines for earning or losing points.
homepage.desKeyFeature22: Award points to individual or groups of students.
homepage.desKeyFeature32: Track student performance on a monthly/weekly basis.
homepage.desKeyFeature41: Teachers provide feedback on each class.
homepage.desKeyFeature42: Parents can view their child's achievements and feedback.
homepage.desKeyFeature43: Students can update their profile picture.
homepage.desAdvantages: OLYMclass, a product of Olympia Vietnam, proudly offers teachers and students a modern and comprehensive learning experience.
homepage.desAdvantage1: With a user-friendly Vietnamese interface, teachers can start using OLYMClass right away without needing any training.
homepage.desAdvantage2: Students can access OLYMclass on the go, from any device with an internet connection.
homepage.desAdvantage3: Parents can simply click on the link to view their child's academic performance and feedback without having to install any application.
homepage.desAdvantage4: With its bright color design, cute avatars and icons, OLYMclass will make students excited and look forward to every lesson.
homepage.desAdvantage5: Just like other features of YourHomework, OLYMclass is always free and unlimited.
homepage.desAdvantage6: Besides extra/minus points, OLYMclass also provides many other useful features such as attendance, statistics, feedback, and profile picture change.
homepage.desDiligentStudent: Students who are hard-working,and do a lot of good things, will be rewarded with fragrant ten-point flowers.
homepage.desOlympiaWebsite1: Do you want your children to learn English in a fun and effective way? Check out our online English teaching website - a place that provides a great learning experience for children.
homepage.desOlympiaWebsite2: With a design based on lessons, games and creative activities for each course at OLYMPIA, this website will help children develop English skills such as listening, speaking, reading and writing naturally and effectively. The content of the lessons is designed to be lively, closely related to the daily lives of children, helping them easily absorb and apply knowledge, grasp lessons after school right at home.
homepage.desOlympiaWebsite3: The special feature of the website is the combination of learning and entertainment. Children will be able to participate in games, practice English activities naturally after school. Through this, children not only improve their skills but also grasp knowledge right at home.
homepage.desOlympiaWebsite4: Join your child in experiencing this website and witness the amazing progress of your child in learning English!
homepage.useGuide: Instructions for using the International English Web
homepage.useGuide2: Log in to your provided account
homepage.useGuide3: Participate in exercises and lessons in the course
homepage.desOlympiaApp1: Do you want your child to learn English effectively while having fun? Download OLYMSTARS now - English to conquer dreams!
homepage.desOlympiaApp2: OLYMSTARS offers listening, speaking, reading, and writing exercises with exciting topics like animals, fruits, and transportation, perfectly aligned with your child's classroom curriculum. Each exercise is designed to be short, engaging, and combines visuals, audio, and video to make learning easy and fun.
homepage.desOlympiaApp3: Additionally, OLYMSTARS tracks your child's progress and provides personalized exercises based on their level and classroom curriculum. Parents can easily monitor their child's learning journey.
homepage.desOlympiaApp4: Download the OLYMSTARS app now and start your child's fun and effective English learning journey at home. Your child will definitely love this experience!
homepage.useGuideChildren: Instructions for using the Children's English App
homepage.useGuideChildren2: Choose the right course for your child's grade
homepage.useGuideChildren3: Participate in exercises and lessons in the course

class.downloadSampleFileExcelPart1: Teachers can download the sample Excel file here and fill in the information:
class.downloadSampleFileExcelPart3: The Excel file includes detailed instructions.
class.defaultListCriteriaClass: This is the default criteria list when creating a class. To save time on editing each class individually, teachers can change it to have one criteria list for all newly created classes. Editing the criteria here will not affect the criteria lists of existing classes.
class.noCoTeacher: There are currently no assistant teachers!
class.endTimeGreaterThanStart: The end time must be greater than the start time
class.confirmDeleteClass: Are you sure you want to delete this class?
class.confirmRemoveClassFromAccount: Do you want to delete this class from your account? (Deleting does not affect class data in the main account)
class.defaultCriteriaDescription: This is the default criteria list when creating a class. Teachers can change it to create their own list. Newly created classes will use this criteria list, saving time on editing each class individually. Editing the criteria here will not affect the criteria lists of already existing classes.
class.coTeacherInstructions: Teacher 2 will copy and send this code to Teacher 1 (class creator), Teacher 1 can add 'Co-Teacher' with that code. At that time, Teacher 1 and Teacher 2 can both manage the class.
class.addRowColumnInstructions: Teachers 'Add row' and 'Add column' to create a diagram (seating location) according to reality in class. EMPTY COLUMNS can be created to illustrate the aisles between rows of desks. If you want to 'Delete last row' or 'Delete last column', make sure that row/column does not contain any students.
class.removeWinnerFromList: Remove the winning student from the list
class.noClassAvailable: No classes are available right now!

class.classCreationError: There was an error creating the class, please check the information
class.requiredFieldsError: Please check that all required fields are not empty
class.deleteClassConfirmation: Do you want to remove this class from your account? (Removing does not affect the class data on the main account)
class.deleteClassError: There was an error while deleting the class

configuration.classCreationCriteriaInfo: This is the default criteria list when creating a class. To save time on editing each class individually, teachers can change it to have one criteria list for all newly created classes. Editing the criteria here will not affect the criteria lists of existing classes.
configuration.coTeacherInstructions: Assistant teacher (GV2) will copy and send the code to the homeroom teacher (GV1), the homeroom teacher (GV1) can add "assistant teacher" with that code. At that time, homeroom teacher (GV1) and assistant teacher (GV2) can both manage the class.

evaluation.enterPoints: Please enter a point greater than 0

groupGenerator.notEnoughNumberDivide: Not enough students to divide! The teachers needs to reduce the number of groups or the number of students in each group.

diagramclass.instructions: Use "Add Row" and "Add Column" to create a layout (seating arrangement) according to the actual classroom setup. You can create EMPTY COLUMNS to illustrate walkways between rows of desks. If you want to "Delete Last Row" or "Delete Last Column," please ensure that the row/column does not contain any students.
